meanings.definition: Occurring in the middle of the week.
meanings.sent1: Our midweekly meeting always falls on Wednesday.
meanings.sent2: The midweekly soccer practice helps break up the week.
meanings.sent3: The midweekly potluck is a nice break from work stress.
meanings.sent4: Her midweekly yoga class is like a refreshing pause in the chaos.
meanings.sent5: The midweekly routine keeps us on track and organized.

meanings.definition: A publication that is issued in the middle of the week.
meanings.sent1: I always look forward to the midweekly newspaper for local updates.
meanings.sent2: The midweekly magazine covers a variety of topics for readers.
meanings.sent3: The midweekly newsletter is full of interesting tidbits.
meanings.sent4: The midweekly journal is a great source of information.
meanings.sent5: The midweekly paper is a reliable source of news.
